A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Without spoiling anything\, this movie met my expectations by not being what I expected. There are a few missed beats and sometimes the cgi goes into prequal territory but when this movie wins it wins big. There are so many twists and turns psychologically it will stick with you for days. Mark Hamill is brilliant in his role breaking all our notions of what it means to be a hero. For the first time since being a Star Wars fan I feel like the slate is clean to start fresh--and we haven't even finished this trilogy yet.
